storyInfo: Giovanna collapses to the ground after an attack. Il Segretario di Sicurezza Alimentare asks Lavinia for help, and Exusiai seeks out Agenir to ask a question that has plagued her for a long time.

attributes.content: Texas!
attributes.name: Sora

attributes.content: What?
attributes.name: Texas

attributes.content: Miss Caterina... I mean, Giovanna, might be in danger!
attributes.name: Sora

attributes.content: What did you say?
attributes.name: Texas

attributes.content: I just called her, and have a really uneasy feeling.
attributes.name: Sora

attributes.content: Lappland.
attributes.name: Texas

attributes.content: Yo.
attributes.name: Lappland

attributes.content: What do you want?
attributes.name: Texas

attributes.content: I just wanted to give you an update on your old friend. She's somewhere near your little hideout, surrounded by wise guys from her own famiglia.
attributes.name: Lappland

attributes.content: Texas, we should go help her!
attributes.name: Sora

attributes.content: ...I know.
attributes.name: Texas

attributes.content: Just a sec.
attributes.name: Lappland

attributes.content: Are you seriously going?
attributes.name: Lappland

attributes.content: You were all ready to make an enemy of the Rossatis to get out of here.
attributes.name: Lappland

attributes.content: But now you're going to stay in the swamp just for her?
attributes.name: Lappland

attributes.content: Think, Texas.
attributes.name: Lappland

attributes.content: This is your best chance to turn around and walk away from it all.
attributes.name: Lappland

attributes.content: Sora...
attributes.name: Texas

attributes.content: You know, Texas?
attributes.name: Sora

attributes.content: This was supposed to be a little job I picked up as a way to go looking for you.
attributes.name: Sora

attributes.content: But, I soon came to realize that I'd fallen in love with Siracusa's performing arts scene.
attributes.name: Sora

attributes.content: People here have a certain arrogance to them, but they're much better than the materialistic Lungmenite businessmen.
attributes.name: Sora

attributes.content: And Exusiai won't stop raving about how she's going to find the best pizza in Siracusa.
attributes.name: Sora

attributes.content: As for Croissant... She's always been easygoing.
attributes.name: Sora

attributes.content: I just wanted to catch up with you. Maybe we can go back to Lungmen after everyone's had enough fun here.
attributes.name: Sora

attributes.content: We'll go back to Lungmen eventually. The four of us, together.
attributes.name: Texas

attributes.content: That's right, the four of us, together.
attributes.name: Sora

attributes.content: Well, actually, I just had a chat with Miss Giovanna and asked her to take a tour of Lungmen with us. So that'd make five.
attributes.name: Sora

attributes.content: ...Okay.
attributes.name: Texas

attributes.content: A number of people have collapsed in an alley.
A number of wounds have appeared across Giovanna's body.
Everyone, including herself, knows there is no escape for her.
Give it up, Giovanna.
attributes.name: Wallach

attributes.content: Got anything to drink, Wallach?
attributes.name: Giovanna

attributes.content: Go grab a bottle from the car.
attributes.name: Wallach

attributes.content: Yessir.
attributes.name: Rossati Mafioso

attributes.content: I've thought about it before. If we would've been better off getting into certain businesses back in Columbia.
attributes.name: Giovanna

attributes.content: Originium weapons, designer drugs, military channels...
attributes.name: Giovanna

attributes.content: I've also thought about... if there were certain opportunities that I should've seized.
attributes.name: Giovanna

attributes.content: Getting on good terms with those officials, or even extending an olive branch to the Columbian government.
attributes.name: Giovanna

attributes.content: But in the end, I decided that some things had to be done in moderation.
attributes.name: Giovanna

attributes.content: We're too deeply invested, we're holding too much. I won't claim to be a good person, but at least we can't forget that there are some things we can't do.
attributes.name: Giovanna

attributes.content: You could call it principle, or you could call it stubbornness.
attributes.name: Giovanna

attributes.content: Times have changed, Giovanna.
attributes.name: Wallach

attributes.content: A new era calls for new norms.
attributes.name: Wallach

attributes.content: The so-called 'morality and justice' of the old guard should be cast aside.
attributes.name: Wallach

attributes.content: Even if we don't do it, someone eventually will. And when that time comes, we'll be the ones who get pushed out.
attributes.name: Wallach

attributes.content: Or you think sitting around, watching Columbia's other famiglie get their mitts on these things is the right way to do it?
attributes.name: Wallach

attributes.content: What would you do in my position, Wallach?
attributes.name: Giovanna

attributes.content: I'll control it all, new and old. Everything will be at my disposal.
attributes.name: Wallach

attributes.content: We're not taking the world back to the old ways, we're turning away from them.
attributes.name: Wallach

attributes.content: Got the booze, Wallach.
attributes.name: Rossati Mafioso

attributes.content: Come on. Have one last drink with me.
attributes.name: Giovanna

attributes.content: Fine.
attributes.name: Wallach

attributes.content: This one's my favorite. You've been waiting a long time for this, haven't you?
attributes.name: Giovanna

attributes.content: It was supposed to celebrate your return.
attributes.name: Wallach

attributes.content: Hah.
attributes.name: Giovanna

attributes.content: Well, how about that. From here on, you're Don Rossati.
attributes.name: Giovanna

attributes.content: Giovanna.
attributes.name: Wallach

attributes.content: Do it.
attributes.name: Giovanna

attributes.content: The sound of sharp metal slicing through flesh appears in the alley.
It is quickly drowned out by the sound of the falling rain.
Texas knows she is already too late.
The alley is scarred by traces of battle, and blood spreads out across the ground.
Her gaze goes to the source of the bloody water, where a familiar figure lies fallen.
Her heart quivers.
Giovanna!
attributes.name: Texas

attributes.content: We should be able to have a nice discussion over here, Your Honor.
attributes.name: Rubio

attributes.content: I won't become your accomplice.
attributes.name: Lavinia

attributes.content: Accomplice? That's a rather extreme choice of words.
attributes.name: Rubio

attributes.content: Shouldn't you be thanking me for saving your life?
attributes.name: Rubio

attributes.content: Forget it, just treat it as an act of kindness on my part.
attributes.name: Rubio

attributes.content: The upside about you young folks is that you're go-getters. The downside is you tend to overdo it.
attributes.name: Rubio

attributes.content: There's nothing I particularly need you to do for me, actually.
attributes.name: Rubio

attributes.content: I just don't want to see an outstanding young woman like you fall.
attributes.name: Rubio

attributes.content: You? Really?
attributes.name: Lavinia

attributes.content: I think the Carracci incident has given you some misconceptions about me.
attributes.name: Rubio

attributes.content: No, I don't think it has.
attributes.name: Lavinia

attributes.content: I happen to care more about what's in front of me, that's all.
attributes.name: Rubio

attributes.content: 'The government is just the cloth draped over Grey Hall's round table.'
attributes.name: Rubio

attributes.content: Lavinia, everyone in Siracusa knows of Signora Sicilia's lament.
attributes.name: Rubio

attributes.content: But I'd imagine there are few who understand the source of this lament.
attributes.name: Rubio

attributes.content: Thirty years ago, there was a group of youths like you who naively believed they could free Siracusa from the famiglie.
attributes.name: Rubio

attributes.content: But there was no end to the dark clouds that hung over the country, and they couldn't conjure up any support.
attributes.name: Rubio

attributes.content: So they chose to try to win over a number of famiglie by catering to their interests, trying to fight... the thing they thought they could resist.
attributes.name: Rubio

attributes.content: As for what happened to them... nobody knows.
attributes.name: Rubio

attributes.content: Nobody knows?
attributes.name: Lavinia

attributes.content: Try to picture this scenario, Signorina Lavinia.
attributes.name: Rubio

attributes.content: Your father is a clerk who works for the city government.
attributes.name: Rubio

attributes.content: One day, you get up, shower, and have breakfast as usual. That's when you realize your father forgot something at home, and your mother asks you to bring it to him.
attributes.name: Rubio

attributes.content: It's the rainy season, and you're in a bad mood because you had an argument with your father. But then you think to yourself, it's partially your fault, and it would be better to just apologize.
attributes.name: Rubio

attributes.content: But when you walk into city hall, you feel an unnatural stillness.
attributes.name: Rubio

attributes.content: The place shouldn't be so quiet at this time of day.
attributes.name: Rubio

attributes.content: Soon, you see blood seeping from beneath the doors of various offices.
attributes.name: Rubio

attributes.content: And that's when you realize that streaks of blood are painted all across the floor.
attributes.name: Rubio

attributes.content: You find that everyone in city hall has gone missing.
attributes.name: Rubio

attributes.content: What scares you even more is that not a single soul will comment on it, no matter who you ask. Even your own mother is completely silent.
attributes.name: Rubio

attributes.content: It's as if the disappeared never existed in the first place.
attributes.name: Rubio

attributes.content: After a while, people begin to appear at city hall again, and a bit after that, the normal hustle and bustle returns.
attributes.name: Rubio

attributes.content: And you finally realize, that's all there is to it.
attributes.name: Rubio

attributes.content: That's when Signora Sicilia's saying really starts to spread.
attributes.name: Rubio

attributes.content: 'The government is just the cloth draped over Grey Hall's round table.' And naturally, the tablecloth can be changed at will.
attributes.name: Rubio

attributes.content: When you've lived through it, you'll understand—
attributes.name: Rubio

attributes.content: Anger. Of course the anger is there. But what happens after the anger passes?
attributes.name: Rubio

attributes.content: After anger, comes nothing.
attributes.name: Rubio

attributes.content: Just as you are now, not knowing who you can even vent your grievance to.
attributes.name: Rubio

attributes.content: To Don Bernardo? To Famiglia Bellone? Or to Signora Sicilia?
attributes.name: Rubio

attributes.content: No, of course not. They are all cogs in the existing machine, and you, as the gatekeeper to this machine, know better than anyone else—
attributes.name: Rubio

attributes.content: It can't be shaken.
attributes.name: Rubio

attributes.content: And that's why you want to tell me... that all I can do is to cover my eyes and ears like you, pretending to be oblivious to everything that's going on.
attributes.name: Lavinia

attributes.content: Pretending I'm living a semblance of what you could call a life.
attributes.name: Lavinia

attributes.content: Signorina Lavinia, you are even more naive than my daughter.
attributes.name: Rubio

attributes.content: And as someone who's experienced it all, my advice to you is the same as the last time you came to me—no matter what your ideals are, you must first live on.
attributes.name: Rubio

attributes.content: And if you're really in that much of a hurry to die, at least find a successor first.
attributes.name: Rubio

attributes.content: Sometimes, living to pass down your ideals can be even more difficult than dying a merciful death.
attributes.name: Rubio

attributes.content: Oh right, I'll be taking up my new post in a few days, and Don Bernardo has arranged a speech for me to deliver to the whole city.
attributes.name: Rubio

attributes.content: There's nothing I need you to do for me, but if you'd like, you are welcome to keep my wife and daughter company.
attributes.name: Rubio

attributes.content: I do believe that isn't anything that would violate your principles.
attributes.name: Rubio

attributes.content: Hmm? You're not going with the rest of your friends, my child?
attributes.name: Agenir

attributes.content: Uhh... I have a somewhat personal question I'd like to ask you.
attributes.name: Exusiai

attributes.content: Oh?
attributes.name: Agenir

attributes.content: Please continue.
attributes.name: Agenir

attributes.content: I learned a few things about you back when I was in school. Back then, both you and His Holiness the Pope were seen as promising young talents.
attributes.name: Exusiai

attributes.content: But after Signora Sicilia visited Laterano, you left with her. Didn't even hesitate.
attributes.name: Exusiai

attributes.content: You want to know why I left Laterano with Sicilia?
attributes.name: Agenir

attributes.content: Not exactly. What I'd like to know is, you must get along very well with Signora Sicilia, right?
attributes.name: Exusiai

attributes.content: That depends on what you mean by 'get along.' But if you mean in terms of understanding, it may be the case that nobody understands her as well as I do.
attributes.name: Agenir

attributes.content: However, our personalities are actually quite incompatible.
attributes.name: Agenir

attributes.content: At least these days, I am happier hiding in this city to avoid the headaches she brings me.
attributes.name: Agenir

attributes.content: Isn't that also part of getting along with someone?
attributes.name: Exusiai

attributes.content: That, I cannot deny.
attributes.name: Agenir

attributes.content: Then, how were you able to stay on good terms with her for decades?
attributes.name: Exusiai

attributes.content: Hahahaha!
attributes.name: Agenir

attributes.content: Senior Agenir, I'm serious!
attributes.name: Exusiai

attributes.content: An excellent question indeed, my child.
attributes.name: Agenir

attributes.content: You certainly ask much more interesting questions than your friend.
attributes.name: Agenir

attributes.content: But first, there's something I'm curious about.
attributes.name: Agenir

attributes.content: From the description you just gave me, you seem to get along very well with Texas.
attributes.name: Agenir

attributes.content: That's right, we're the best partners out there~
attributes.name: Exusiai

attributes.content: You don't doubt your friendship at all.
attributes.name: Agenir

attributes.content: Not even a little.
attributes.name: Exusiai

attributes.content: In that case— Ah, I see now. The reason behind your question.
attributes.name: Agenir

attributes.content: Shared empathy allows you to treat people without reservation, but you still have doubts about the process of getting along with those who lack that empathy.
attributes.name: Agenir

attributes.content: Moreover, it is not deception that you fear, but this doubt itself.
attributes.name: Agenir

attributes.content: You are ashamed of this doubt when you are reciprocated with nothing but sincerity.
attributes.name: Agenir

attributes.content: But at the same time, you are also afraid of how you will handle yourself if these doubts prove to be true one day.
attributes.name: Agenir

attributes.content: Is that the case?
attributes.name: Agenir

attributes.content: Um, yeah, that's exactly what I was thinking!
attributes.name: Exusiai

attributes.content: I think every Sankta who leaves Laterano will encounter this problem.
attributes.name: Agenir

attributes.content: When Sicilia came to visit Laterano, I was tasked with serving as her guide.
attributes.name: Agenir

attributes.content: However, I did not leave Laterano with her because I was persuaded by her ideals, as the rumors claim.
attributes.name: Agenir

attributes.content: Sicilia was still young at the time, and no matter how talented she was, it was impossible for her to instantly come up with a way to change Siracusa after but a brief stay in Laterano.
attributes.name: Agenir

attributes.content: Her ideals were puerile and unrealistic, but they happened to resonate with some of my own thoughts at the time.
attributes.name: Agenir

attributes.content: We discussed and argued our ideas day and night until finally, I decided to go with her to Siracusa to settle them.
attributes.name: Agenir

attributes.content: Discussing, and arguing...
attributes.name: Exusiai

attributes.content: Yes.
attributes.name: Agenir

attributes.content: Even after coming to Siracusa, we never settled the arguments between us. As a matter of fact, our views on Siracusa have never quite lined up.
attributes.name: Agenir

attributes.content: But this does not prevent us from understanding what the other is thinking.
attributes.name: Agenir

attributes.content: So, the key is discussing and arguing?
attributes.name: Exusiai

attributes.content: Haha, what do you think?
attributes.name: Agenir

attributes.content: I don't think that's right.
attributes.name: Exusiai

attributes.content: I don't think Texas and I ever had any serious discussions about anything. I'm not even sure when it happened, but we somehow became really good partners.
attributes.name: Exusiai

attributes.content: You're a perceptive one, my child.
attributes.name: Agenir

attributes.content: In the end, what kept me bound to Sicilia was not ideals, convenience, or even emotions.
attributes.name: Agenir

attributes.content: But time.
attributes.name: Agenir

attributes.content: Time?
attributes.name: Exusiai

attributes.content: The passage of time will bridge most gaps and bind people together, regardless of what they think about it.
attributes.name: Agenir

attributes.content: You'll always be good partners, won't you?
attributes.name: Agenir

attributes.content: Of course. Always and forever.
attributes.name: Exusiai

attributes.content: Then, all you need to do is keep moving forward.
attributes.name: Agenir

attributes.content: You will experience many different things, as will she.
attributes.name: Agenir

attributes.content: Perhaps your stories will individually have very little in common.
attributes.name: Agenir

attributes.content: But as long as your lives intertwine at some point...
attributes.name: Agenir

attributes.content: Well, you'll have nothing to worry about.
attributes.name: Agenir
